name: MPlat
description:
Install instructionsLinux Installation
  1. Open ZIP File
  2. Run File “Start.sh”

LINUX SUPPORT IS COMPLETELY EXPERIMENTAL.

Windows Installation
  1. Open ZIP File
  2. Run File “MPlat.exe”
Macintosh Installation
  1. Open ZIP File In Finder. A New File Should Spawn As “MPlat.app”
  2. Open “MPlat.app”

DON’T BE CONCERNED ABOUT THE GATEKEEPER WARNINGS - THE SITE USED, THE TURBOWARP PACKAGER (packager.turbowarp.org) GENERATES APPS THAT REQUIRE THAT WORKAROUND.

Browser Installation
  1. Open “MPlat.html”
